author: Cult_Of_Skaro
title: 4105-1 Red Bucket
review:
This is one of the well-known brick buckets, which, rather than being actual sets, are bought for the parts. Sadly, the parts in question are just bricks, so it isn't really that interesting.


What I liked

  • Good if you want a simple starter set for a kid just getting into LEGO
  • Lots of small builds for kids to play with
  • At least there's a minifig

What I didn't

  • Not interesting once you pass about age 6
  • No interesting parts, i.e. hinges and unique parts
  • The minifig's really not that great

Verdict

            Don't buy it unless you're some sort of brick bucket completest. If you want a brick             bucket, the more current ones offer you a lot more than just bricks.
